name: Olympic Heavy Duty AA Battery
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from China. The Olympic Heavy Duty AA Battery 2 pcs offers a reliable power solution for various household devices. The pack contains two AA-sized batteries, known for their durability and long-lasting performance. ​Ingredients: As a battery, the ingredients generally include components like zinc, manganese dioxide, and electrolytes, though the specific formulation is not typically detailed for consumer purchase​. Use: These batteries are designed for powering devices such as remote controls, toys, flashlights, and other low to moderate-drain electronic items. They provide a dependable energy source for everyday household use.

name: Sunlite Heavy Duty AA Battery
description:
SUNLITE batteries have been renowned for their quality and reliability for over 30 years, resulting in over 70% of the national market share showing the trust the people of Bangladesh have in the brand over any local or international rival.  Brand: SUNLIGHT  Product Name: SUNLIGHT AA BATTERY  Chemical System: Zinc-manganese Dioxide  Size: UM-3(R06)/AA  Nominal Voltage: 1.5 Volt  Operating Temp.: – 5 to 450C Jacket: Meta/Vinyl  Shelf life: 24 months

name: Olympic Volt Remote Battery
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from China. The Olympic Volt Remote Battery (Paper UM-4) comes in a pack of 2 and is designed for use in various electronic devices, such as remote controls. These batteries are made of durable materials with a steel shell and aluminum foil. With a nominal voltage of 1.5V, these batteries offer reliable performance for everyday devices.

name: Olympic Volt Pencil Battery Metallic
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from China. The Olympic Volt Pencil Battery Metallic (1 Pcs) is an affordable, reliable AA battery suitable for powering various everyday devices. It has a nominal voltage of 1.5V and a capacity of 2.1Ah, making it ideal for items like remotes, clocks, toys, and flashlights. The battery comes in a durable metallic casing, providing solid protection and ensuring long-lasting performance in everyday applications.

name: Olympic Gold Heavy Duty AA Battery
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from China. The Olympic Gold Heavy Duty AA Battery is designed for reliable, long-lasting performance and has the following specifications: Brand Name: OlympicModel Number: AAPlace of Origin: ChinaShape: CylindricalMaterial: Steel Shell Aluminum FoilDimensions: 50.5 mm x 14.5 mmNominal Voltage: 1.5VNominal Capacity: 2.1AhEnd-Off Voltage: 0.8VThis battery is suitable for various household and electronic devices, offering consistent energy output for daily use. The robust design ensures durability, and it’s well-suited for remotes, flashlights, clocks, and toys
